languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс едва заметно качает головой.{/n} "Доброй. Ночи. {name}". {n}Отчеканив каждое слово, дознаватель склоняет голову и направляется к выходу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс едва заметно качает головой.{/n} "Доброй. Ночи. {name}". {n}Отчеканив каждое слово, дознаватель склоняет голову и направляется к выходу.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс едва заметно качает головой.{/n} "Доброй. Ночи. {name}". {n}Отчеканив каждое слово, дознаватель склоняет голову и направляется к выходу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希轻轻地摇了摇头。{/n}“晚安了，{name}。”{n}他重重地咬着每个字，之后侧着头，朝门口走去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希轻轻地摇了摇头。{/n}“晚安了，{name}。”{n}他重重地咬着每个字，之后侧着头，朝门口走去。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix menea la cabeza de forma casi imperceptible.{/n} «Buenas. Noches. {name}». {n}Esta vez enfatiza cada palabra antes de inclinar la cabeza y dirigirse a la puerta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix menea la cabeza de forma casi imperceptible.{/n} «Buenas. Noches. {name}». {n}Esta vez enfatiza cada palabra antes de inclinar la cabeza y dirigirse a la puerta.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリクスは最小限のわずかな動きで首を振る。{/n}「よい、夜を。{name}」{n}ハインリクスは一言一言を力強く発声すると、うなずいてから扉に向かって移動する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリクスは最小限のわずかな動きで首を振る。{/n}「よい、夜を。{name}」{n}ハインリクスは一言一言を力強く発声すると、うなずいてから扉に向かって移動する。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt kaum wahrnehmbar den Kopf.{/n} "Gute. Nacht. {name}", {n}sagt er und betont dabei jedes Wort, bevor der den Kopf senkt und Richtung Tür geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt kaum wahrnehmbar den Kopf.{/n} "Gute. Nacht. {name}", {n}sagt er und betont dabei jedes Wort, bevor der den Kopf senkt und Richtung Tür geht.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix secoue imperceptiblement la tête.{/n} « Bonne. Nuit. {name}, » {n}articule-t-il en accentuant chaque mot avant d'incliner la tête et de se diriger vers la sortie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix secoue imperceptiblement la tête.{/n} « Bonne. Nuit. {name}, » {n}articule-t-il en accentuant chaque mot avant d'incliner la tête et de se diriger vers la sortie.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, olabilecek en hafif şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "İyi. geceler. {name}." {n}Her kelimeyi vurgulaya vurgulaya söylüyor, ardından başını eğip kapıya yöneliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the smallest shake of his head.{/n} "Good. Night. {name}," {n}he says, emphasising every word, before inclining his head and moving toward the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix olabilecek en hafif şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "İyi. Geceler. {name}." {n}Her kelimeyi vurgulaya vurgulaya söylüyor, ardından başını eğiyor ve kapıya yöneliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
